title: The Mighty Little Shennong - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Harem   Martial Arts   Romance   Xianxia
tags: Alchemy   Body Tempering   Cultivation   Farming   Fast Cultivation   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Polygamy
author: Uncle Zhang   张家三叔
description:
The little farmer had an incredible adventure and his medical skills were amazing.

Growing vegetables and growing herbs, practicing alchemy and immortality.

Training the fox, walk the dog, practice boxing to fight, tease the children and drink tea.

Beat red dates, chestnuts and pickled cucumbers.

Bring the beauties to enjoy the flowers, watch the sunset in the fields.

Look, how beautiful are beauties, how picturesque mountains are!

This is a legendary story of a young farmer standing against the sky, strolling with flowers, looking at the city and smiling proudly at the world.>
